name: Pepe on Base
description: Pepe has returned to the base with a determination to revolutionize the chain and ignite excitement. Back when Pepe initially arrived, the atmosphere was subdued, the chain was in its infancy, and individuals faced financial struggles. However, Pepe is now primed to embark on a journey that surpasses all expectations, propelling the base to new heights of success. Launched stealth with no presale, zero taxes, LP burnt and contract renounced, Pepe is a coin for the people, forever. Fueled by pure memetic power,
